text: Ezɨ Godɨn akɨnafarimɨn osizirim ghaze, “Kɨ arazir kurabar saghon ikiava, bar zue, eghtɨ ia uaghan nan mɨn arazir kurabar saghon ikɨ, bar zuegh, egh nan gumazamizibara ikɨ.” Godɨn ian diazim, arazir kuratam an itir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ kamaghɨn ia uaghan, ia amir arazitam ikuvighan markɨ. Ia, an gumazamizibara.
